named-query.name: MetricValue.findValuesAggregatedByCommitAndMetric
named-query.query: SELECT NEW org.wickedsource.coderadar.metric.domain.metricvalue.MetricValueDTO (m.id.metricName, sum(m.value)) FROM MetricValue m WHERE m.id.commit.project.id = :projectId AND m.id.metricName IN (:metricNames) AND m.id.commit.sequenceNumber = (SELECT max(m2.id.commit.sequenceNumber) FROM MetricValue m2 WHERE m2.id.commit.sequenceNumber<=:commitSequenceNumber AND m2.id.file.identity.id = m.id.file.identity.id AND m2.id.metricName = m.id.metricName) GROUP BY m.id.metricName

named-query.name: MetricValue.findValuesAggregatedByCommitAndProfile
named-query.query: SELECT NEW org.wickedsource.coderadar.metric.domain.metricvalue.ProfileValuePerCommitDTO (qpm.profile.name, qpm.metricType, sum(mv.value)) FROM QualityProfileMetric qpm, MetricValue mv WHERE qpm.name = mv.id.metricName AND qpm.profile.project.id = :projectId AND qpm.profile.name IN (:profileNames) AND mv.id.commit.sequenceNumber = (SELECT max(m2.id.commit.sequenceNumber) FROM MetricValue m2 WHERE m2.id.commit.sequenceNumber<=:commitSequenceNumber AND m2.id.file.identity.id = mv.id.file.identity.id AND m2.id.metricName = mv.id.metricName) GROUP BY qpm.profile.id, qpm.metricType

named-query.name: MetricValue.findValuesAggregatedByModule
named-query.query: SELECT NEW org.wickedsource.coderadar.metric.domain.metricvalue.MetricValuePerModuleDTO(m.id.metricName, sum(m.value), a.module.path) FROM MetricValue m, CommitToFileAssociation a WHERE m.id.file.id = a.id.file.id AND m.id.commit.project.id = :projectId AND m.id.metricName IN (:metricNames) AND a.id.commit.sequenceNumber = m.id.commit.sequenceNumber AND m.id.commit.sequenceNumber = (SELECT max(m2.id.commit.sequenceNumber) FROM MetricValue m2 WHERE m2.id.commit.sequenceNumber<=:commitSequenceNumber AND m2.id.file.identity.id = m.id.file.identity.id AND m2.id.metricName = m.id.metricName) GROUP BY m.id.metricName, a.module.path
